chats.fallback: No chat selected. Please select a chat to start messaging.

data-sources.delete-warning: This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to permanently delete this file from your data sources?

prompting.name: Assistant name
prompting.name-placeholder: The name that the assistant will be introduced with...
prompting.temperature-tooltip: Controls the assistant's creativity. A higher value means more creativity, and a lower value means less creativity.
prompting.instructions-placeholder:
Write the general instructions for the assistant here. Example:
- Provide clear and direct answers.
- If the user asks an ambiguous question, request more details before responding.
prompting.tone-placeholder: Write here the tone or language you want the assistant to use. Example: formal, casual, etc.
prompting.saved: The assistant's settings have been updated

auth.message: Enter your email and password to login to your account.

create-chatbot.name-and-identity-description: In this step, assign a unique name to your chatbot and briefly define its identity and tasks. A good system message will help guide its behavior.
create-chatbot.credentials-description: In this step, you will need to complete the necessary credentials to integrate WhatsApp Business, including the associated phone number. It is essential that you enter this data correctly for the connection to work optimally.
create-chatbot.system-message-placeholder: Example: You are a digital assistant that helps users solve problems and provide useful information. Be concise, clear, and friendly.
